name: Osprey Farpoint Wheeled 65 Travel Pack - Men's
description: Whether you're running for your gate or searching narrow side streets for your hotel, this well-built travel pack won't hold you back. Oversized wheels roll smoothly on tile and tarmac, and when things get rough you can deploy Osprey's supportive harness system for comfortable long-distance carries. For extra capacity and tripping versatility, consider adding Osprey's Daylite daypack, which is designed to fasten securely to the Farpoint in both its rolling and carrying configurations.Rugged nylon fabric.Comfortable suspension system is suitable for long carries, with a tensioned mesh back panel and padded shoulder straps and hipbelt.Stowaway cover protects straps and hipbelt when not in use.Smooth-rolling 90mm wheels and retractable carry handle save you energy at the airport and hotel.Padded top and side handles for quick lifts from luggage carousels and carts.Large front panel provides easy access for packing and finding items.Internal compression straps and fabric wings keep your clothes from shifting while in transit.Zippered top pocket for smaller items.Compatible with Osprey Daylite daypack (sold separately) which attaches to front panel for added capacity and day tripping versatility.
